rule: The output should include additional text, explanation, or context rather than just the name of the category.
input: Scientists discover new exoplanet orbiting distant star
validityText:
The input is a string, which matches the requirement that the input must be a piece of text intended to be classified into a specific news category. The input describes a news-related discovery in the area of science. This can be classified under the specified category of "Sci/Tech." There is no requirement in the specification that restricts the length of the input, and it is written in English, which is typically the language the chatbot would process. 

Based on these observations, the input complies with all stated requirements of the input specification.

OK
